item.description:
This is an adult sized espionage game where you participate.  We will need a group of 20 to 30 people to get the maximum enjoyment and it looks like fun.  http://www.5-wits.com/espionage.aspx

Instead of watching and cheering you move through a series of challenges and mazes - this isn't Jason Bourne but it will feel like it.  The web site is the best description.

Tickets are $18 each and the price of $18.91 includes 2.95% for PayPal plus a $0.35 transaction fee.

After the event there are plenty of pl;ace to grab a meal close by.

NOTE:  YOU MUST BE A PAID UP MEMBER TO ATTEND.  If you haven't paid the $10 group fee for the first half of 2013 DO NOT RSVP.  NO refunds for non-members.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Real action espionage group action game at 5-wits
